channel.title: Day Day Up
channel.description: Recent content on Day Day Up

item.description: Link class Solution { public char firstUniqChar(String s) { Map<Character, Boolean> map = new HashMap<>(); int[] counts = new int[26]; char[] chs = s.toCharArray(); for (char c : chs) { counts[c - 'a']++; map.put(c, !map.containsKey(c)); } for (char c : chs) { if (map.get(c)) return c; } return ' '; } }
